channel.title: Functions on REEECode Docs

item.title: Definition
item.description: To do a define we YEET then set an expresion and close with YANK.

item.title: Returning
item.description: Return from the function is accomplished by GLOMP.

item.title: Calling
item.description: Put functions name in code with a pair of ~~ to have the function run there. Or simply use a cell phone.
